All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdjacentIslands
 
ANSIConstants
This class contains al the ANSI escape code used for the CLI
Answer
This class represents the generic answer server to client
AnswerHandler
This class is used to generate event based on the server's answer.
AssistantCard
The AssistantCard class represent the card of the game.
AssistantCardPlayedAnswer
This class represent the answer given to the clients when one player plays an assistant card.
Bag
This class represents the bag of the game: the two constructors initialize the bag with the specified number of tokens
BanExpertCardBean
This class is a simplified representation of the model in the server.
BannedIsland
 
BannedIslandCard
 
BanTile
 
Board
This class represent the board, called in italian "Plancia", of each individual player.
BoardBean
This class is a simplified representation of the model in the server.
CardBack
 
CardBackChoiceAnswer
This class represent the answer given to the clients that lets them choose their card back
ChoiceController
Main controller for the choice scene
ChooseCardBack
 
ChooseTowerColor
 
CLI
This is the main class for the Command Line Interface.
Client
Main class of the client.
CloudBean
This class is a simplified representation of the model in the server.
CloudsUpdateAnswer
This class represent the answer given to the clients when one player choose a cloud.
CloudTile
This class represent the cloud tile, shared by every player.
Color
 
ColorChosen
 
Disconnect
This class is a message client to server that indicate a player has disconnected
ExceptOneColorCalculator
This class implements a calculator that ignores one single kind of color in the checkInfluence method
ExpertCard
This class implements the expert card system
ExpertCard_ID
Enum used to enumerate the expert card in the UI
ExpertCardBean
This class is a simplified representation of the model in the server.
ExpertCardUpdateAnswer
This class represent the answer given to the clients when one player moves mother nature.
ExpertGame
This subclass of game is instantiated when selecting Expert Mode, it adds the coin and expert cards system
Game
This class represent the game itself, because it contains the game's logic.
GameBean
This class is a simplified representation of the model in the server.
GameConstants
This interface is a part of the factory pattern used for managing game's constants.
GameConstantsCreator
This abstract class is a part of the factory pattern used for managing game's constants.
GameConstantsCreatorThreePlayers
This class is a part of the factory pattern used for managing game's constants.
GameConstantsCreatorTwoPlayers
This class is a part of the factory pattern used for managing game's constants.
GameDisconnectionException
This Exception is thrown when there's a disconnection that cause the saving mechanism of a game
GameHandler
This is the controller of the game, handles all the messages from the players, sending messages and request for any object It also handles the various phases of the game, the wrong input of the parameters and the endgame condition
GameState
This enum set represents the state of the game
GameStateAnswer
This class represent the answer given to the clients used to initialize the view.
GenericAnswer
This class represents a string sent from the server to the client, used for a generic message
GenericController
Main controller for the Generic scene
GenericMessage
 
GUI
Main class for the graphic user interface.
GUIController
 
Help
 
IncrementMaxMovement
This interface has the purpose of hiding methods and attributes in game, leaving the only useful for this scope.
IncrementMaxMovementCard
This class represents the Increment Max Movement Card, which effect is to increment the maximum movement possible for the player in that turn.
InfluenceCalculator
This class is an interface for the state pattern
InfluenceCardsCluster
This class implements three expert cards that change the way influence is calculated
InfluenceCluster
This interface only has one method to change the calculator inside game (the current calculator)
IntegerMessage
 
IslandBean
This class is a simplified representation of the model in the server.
IslandTile
This class represents the single Islands in the game, with methods that can control their state and handle the conquest of an island after the movement of mother nature.
Login
 
MainController2
This is the main controller for the 2 player scene
MainController3
This is the main controller for the 3 player scene
MainMenuController
Main controller for the menu scene
Message
This class is a generic message client to server
MotherNatureUpdateAnswer
This class represent the answer given to the clients when one player moves mother nature.
MoveStudentMessage
 
MultiServer
This class is the main class of the server.
Nickname
This class is a message client to server that setup connection for the player with provided nickname.
NicknameAnswer
This class represent the answer given to the clients to associate their nickname with the UI.
NoTowerCalculator
This class implements the influence calculator that ignores towers
Ping
 
Player
The Player class contains all the information about the player and the methods to actually play the game.
PlayerBean
This class is a simplified representation of the model in the server.
PlayExpertCard
 
Pong
This message is sent to the client while a game has not started.
PseudoMotherNature
This interface has the purpose of hiding methods and attributes in game, leaving the only useful for this scope.
PseudoMotherNatureCard
This class represents the PseudoMotherNature card
PutThreeStudentsInTheBag
 
PutThreeStudentsInTheBagCard
 
ReconnectionHandler
This class is used to manage the persistence mechanism
RefillInterface
This interface is used for information hiding because the Round class has to refill the cloud tiles
RequestExpertModeAnswer
 
RequestNicknameAnswer
 
RequestNumPlayerAnswer
 
Round
The Round class incorporates the management of the different planning and action phases.
RoundObserver
 
ServerClientHandler
This class contains the streams through witch the server communicates with a single client
SetupGameDisconnectionException
This Exception is thrown when there's a disconnection that do not cause the saving mechanism of a game
Shutdown
This class represent the answer given to the clients to disconnect them from the server.
SocketClient
This class creates a new socket that communicates with the server.
SocketServer
This class creates a new socket that accepts connections with clients and creates a thread associated with them.
StandardCalculator
The Standard checkInfluence calculator state
StartAnswer
 
StopMessage
 
StudBufferExpertCardBean
This class is a simplified representation of the model in the server.
StudentsBufferCardsCluster
This class implements the expert card system by clustering three cards
StudentsBufferCluster
This interface contains methods for moving around students,according to the effect of expert cards.
StudentsHandler
This class utilizes a Hashmap to represent the tokens, and a MaxSize that is the maximum number of students for each color
SwapStudents
This interface has the purpose of hiding methods and attributes in game, leaving the only useful for this scope.
SwapStudentsCard
This class represents the card that allows the player to swap a maximum of two students from the entrance to the hall and vice versa.
TakeProfessorEqualStudents
This interface is used to implement an Expert Game card
TakeProfessorEqualStudentsCard
This class implements a single expert card
ThreePlayersConstants
This class is a concrete implementation of the interface GameConstants.
ToHallUpdateAnswer
This class represent the answer given to the clients when one player moves a student from the entrance to the hall.
ToIslandUpdateAnswer
This class represent the answer given to the clients when one player moves a student from the entrance to an island.
Tower
 
TowerChoiceAnswer
This class represent the answer given to the clients that lets them choose their tower color
TwoMoreCalculator
This class extends a standard calculator adding 2 more influence point to the count
TwoPlayersConstants
This class is a concrete implementation of the interface GameConstants.
UI
This class defines an interface used for both CLI and GUI.
WinningAnswer
